TextView.android:text:
You can use -'Save Current Location' button to save location where you want your mobile phone to be in vibrate mode. After leaving the place, phone will automatically turn into normal mode. 

 Pressing 'Get Location Via Map' you can see previously marked areas or you can mark new by just touching the location on google map. 

 You can use 'View Saved Location' button to see previously saved location and if you want to delete any location you have to just click on the location name and select delete option.

 After saving your location if you press 'Start' in menu bar then the app will start to run and you will get notification in time. 

 You can get location from application sever by pressing 'Get Location From Web'.

 If you want to stop the service just click on 'Stop' in menu bar.
